title: The prophecy
description: “5 stars - Give this book a try and you will be longing for a sequel!Great read. Danielle did a great job with the prophecy and I look foward to the sequel. Mysterious, sexy and all the good things. She is a good writer and keeps you wanting more.” – amazon ca review“5 stars - Fun for a hot summer's afternoon reading!I really enjoyed this story... I love the characters and am looking forward to more stories in this world.I love strong female characters and Sarah is kind, sweet and strong all at once.” – amazon ca reviewPrequel to the seriesSarah was not expecting to find love when she started her new job. She feels drawn to him like to no other man before. Things escalate quickly but she will soon find out that Sam is not exactly the man she thinks he is. She has heard of werewolves in movies, but never did she imagine they exist.Soon, she finds herself in the middle of a dark and ancient prophecy threatening to awaken. With her mate at her side, will she be able to save the pack from this prophecy?
author: Danielle Paquette-Harvey
